cu.explanation_en: Changing the gNB ID from a hex string to a number will cause type validation errors during CU configuration parsing.

du.explanation_en: Setting the gNB ID to an invalid string 'invalid' will cause hex parsing errors and prevent DU initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將 gNB ID 設定為無效字串 'invalid' 會導致十六進制解析錯誤，並阻止 DU 初始化。
